Verses: 1 karththar Dhaaveedhai Avanudaiya Ellaa Saththurukkalin Kaikkum, Savulin Kaikkum, Neengalaakki Viduviththapodhu, Karththarukku Munbaagap Paadina Paattu:
2 karththar En Kanmalaiyum, En Kottaiyum, En Ratchagarumaanavar.
3 dhevan Naan Nambiyirukkira Thurukkamum, En Kedagamum, En Ratchaniyakkompum, En Uyarndha Adaikkalamum, En Pugalidamum, En Ratchagarumaanavar; Ennai Valladikku Neengalaakki Ratchikkiravar Avare.
4 sthudhikkup Paaththiraraagiya Karththarai Nokkik Kooppiduven; Adhanaal En Saththurukkalukku Neengalaakki Ratchikkappaduven.
5 marana Alaigal Ennai Soozhndhukondu, Thurchchanappravaagam Ennai Bayappaduththinadhu.
6 paadhaalak Kattugal Ennai Soozhndhukondadhu; Maranakkannigal Enmel Vizhundhadhu.
7 enakku Undaana Nerukkaththile Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu, En Dhevanai Nokki Abayamitten; Thamadhu Aalayaththilirundhu En Saththaththaik Kettaar, En Kooppidudhal Avar Sevigalil Eritru.
8 appozhudhu Boomi Asaindhu Adhirndhadhu; Avar Kobankondapadiyaal Vaanaththin Asthibaarangal Kulungi Asaindhadhu.
9 avar Naasiyilirundhu Patchikkira Pugai Ezhumbitru, Avar Vaayilirundhu Akkini Purappattadhu, Adhanaal Thazhalmoondadhu.
10 vaanangalaith Thaazhththi Iranginaar; Avar Paadhangalin Keezh Kaarirul Irundhadhu.
11 kerubeeninmel Eri Vegamaai Sendraar. Kaatrin Settaigalinmeedhil Dharisanamaanaar.
12 aagaayaththu Megangalile Koodiya Thanneergalin Irulaith Thammai Sutrilum Irukkum Koodaaramaakkinaar.
13 avarudaiya Sannidhip Pragaasaththinaal Neruppuththazhalum Erindhadhu.
14 karththar Vaanaththilirundhu Kumuri, Unnadhamaanavar Thamadhu Saththaththai Thonikkappanninaar.
15 avar Ambugalai Eydhu, Avargalai Sidhara Adiththu, Minnalgalaip Prayogiththu, Avargalaik Kalangappanninaar.
16 karththarudaiya Kandidhaththinaalum, Avarudaiya Naasiyin Suvaasa Kaatrinaalum Samuththiraththin Madhagugal Thiravundu, Poodhalaththin Asthibaarangal Kaanappattadhu.
17 uyaraththilirundhu Avar Kai Neetti, Ennaip Pidiththu, Jalappravaagaththilirukkira Ennaith Thookkivittaar.
18 ennilum Balavaangalaayirundha En Balaththa Saththuruvukkum En Pagaignarukkum Ennai Viduviththaar.
19 en Aabaththunaalile Enakku Edhirittu Vandhaargal; Karththaro Enakku Aadharavaayirundhaar.
20 enmel Avar Piriyamaayirundhapadiyaal, Visaalamaana Idaththile Ennaik Konduvandhu, Ennaith Thappuviththaar.
21 karththar En Needhikkuththakkadhaaga Enakkup Padhil Aliththaar; En Kaigalin Suththaththirkuththakkadhaaga Enakku Sarikkattinaar.
22 karththarudaiya Vazhigalaik Kaaththukkonduvandhen; Naan En Dhevanukkuth Dhrogampanninadhillai.
23 avarudaiya Nyaayangalaiyellaam Enakku Munbaaga Niruththinen; Naan Avarudaiya Pramaanangalai Vittu Vilagaamal,
24 avar Munbaaga Mana Unmaiyaayirundhu, En Thurkkunaththirku Ennaivilakkik Kaaththukkonden.
25 aagaiyaal Karththar En Needhikkuththakkadhaagavum, Thammudaiya Kangalukkumun Irukkira En Suththaththirkuththakkadhaagavum Enakkup Palanaliththaar.
26 dhayavullavanukku Neer Dhayavullavaraagavum, Uththamanukku Neer Uththamaraagavum,
27 punidhanukku Neer Punidharaagavum, Maarupaadaanavanukku Neer Maarupadugiravaraagavum Thondruveer.
28 sirumaippatta Janaththai Ratchippeer; Mettimaiyaanavargalaith Thaazhththa, Ummudaiya Kangal Avargalukku Virodhamaaith Thiruppappattirukkiradhu.
29 karththaraagiya Dhevareer En Vilakkaayirukkireer; Karththar En Irulai Velichchamaakkugiravar.
30 ummaale Naan Oru Senaikkul Paaindhupoven; En Dhevanaale Orumadhilaith Thaanduven.
31 dhevanudaiya Vazhi Uththamamaanadhu; Karththarudaiya Vasanam Pudamidappattadhu; Thammai Nambugira Anaivarukkum Avar Kedagamaayirukkiraar.
32 karththarai Allaamal Dhevan Yaar? Nammudaiya Dhevanaiyandri Kanmalaiyum Yaar?
33 dhevan Enakku Balaththa Aranaanavar; Avar En Vazhiyai Sevvaippaduththugiravar.
34 avar En Kaalgalai Maangaludaiya Kaalgalaippolaakki, En Uyarthalangalil Ennai Niruththugiraar.
35 vengala Villum En Buyangalaal Valaiyumpadi, En Kaigalai Yuththaththirkup Pazhakkuvikkiraar.
36 ummudaiya Ratchippin Kedagaththaiyum Enakkuth Thandheer; Ummudaiya Kaaruniyam Ennaip Periyavanaakkum.
37 en Kaalgal Vazhuvaadhapadikku Naan Nadakkira Vazhiyai Agalamaakkineer.
38 en Saththurukkalaip Pinthodarndhu Avargalai Azhippen; Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkumvaraikkum Thirumben.
39 avargal Ezhundhirukkamaattaadhapadikku En Paadhangalin Keezh Vizhundhaargal; Avargalai Muriya Adiththu Vettinen.
40 yuththaththirku Neer Ennai Balaththaal Idaikatti, Enmel Ezhumbinavargalai Enkeezh Madangappannineer.
41 naan En Pagaignarai Sangarikkumpadiyaaga, En Saththurukkalin Pidariyai Enakku Oppukkoduththeer.
42 avargal Nokkip Paarkkiraargal, Avargalai Ratchippaar Oruvarumillai; Karththarai Nokkippaarkkiraargal, Avargalukku Avar Uththaravu Kodukkiradhillai.
43 avargalai Boomiyin Thoolaaga Idiththu, Therukkalin Setraippola Avargalai Midhiththu Sidharappannugiren.
44 en Janaththin Sandaigalukku Neer Ennai Vilakkivittu, Jaadhigalukku Ennaith Thalaivanaaga Vaikkireer; Naan Ariyaadha Janangal Ennai Sevikkiraargal.
45 anniyar Ichchagam Pesi Enakku Adangi, En Saththaththaik Kettavudane Enakkuk Keezhppadigiraargal.
46 anniyar Munaivizhundhupoi, Thangal Arangalilirundhu Thaththalippaaip Purappadugiraargal.
47 karththar Jeevanullavar; En Kanmalaiyaanavar Sthoththirikkappaduvaaraaga; En Ratchippin Kanmalaiyaagiya Dhevan Uyarndhiruppaaraaga.
48 avar Enakkaagap Pazhikkup Pazhivaangi, Janangalai Enakkuk Keezhppaduththugira Dhevanaanavar.
49 avare En Saththurukkalukku Ennai Vilakki Viduvikkiravar; Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugiravargalmel Ennai Uyarththik Kodumaiyaana Manushanukku Ennaith Thappuvikkiraar.
50 idhinimiththam Karththaave, Jaadhigalukkul Ummaith Thudhiththu, Ummudaiya Naamaththirku Sangeedham Paaduven.
51 thaam Erpaduththina Raajaavukku Magaththaana Ratchippai Aliththu, Thaam Abishegampannina Dhaaveedhukkum Avan Sandhadhikkum Sadhaakaalamum Kirubai Seygiraar.
